storyTitle: As Employee, I want to view my daily schedule to plan my workday effectively

testCases.title: Validate daily schedule display for authenticated employee
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials in the system
Employee has at least one shift assigned for the current day
Web portal is accessible and operational
Database contains accurate schedule data for the employee
Network connectivity is stable

steps.action: Navigate to the web portal login page using a supported browser
steps.expectedResult: Login page is displayed with username and password fields

steps.action: Enter valid employee credentials (username and password) and click the Login button
steps.expectedResult: Login is successful and employee dashboard is displayed with navigation menu visible

steps.action: Click on the 'Schedule' or 'My Schedule' option in the navigation menu
steps.expectedResult: Daily schedule view for the current day is displayed by default showing the date header

steps.action: Review the displayed schedule and verify shift start time is shown
steps.expectedResult: Shift start time is clearly displayed in the correct time format (e.g., 9:00 AM)

steps.action: Verify shift end time is displayed for each shift
steps.expectedResult: Shift end time is clearly displayed in the correct time format (e.g., 5:00 PM)

steps.action: Verify the location/workplace is displayed for each shift
steps.expectedResult: Location information is displayed accurately (e.g., 'Building A - Floor 3' or 'Downtown Office')

steps.action: Verify the role/position is displayed for each shift
steps.expectedResult: Role information is displayed accurately (e.g., 'Customer Service Representative' or 'Sales Associate')

steps.action: Cross-reference displayed schedule data with database records using employee ID and current date
steps.expectedResult: All displayed shift times, locations, and roles match exactly with the EmployeeSchedules table records

steps.action: Verify the page load time from clicking Schedule menu to full display
steps.expectedResult: Page loads completely within 2 seconds as per performance requirements

postconditions: Employee remains logged into the system
Daily schedule remains displayed on screen
No errors are logged in the system
Session remains active for further navigation

testCases.title: Verify navigation to previous and next days
preconditions: Employee is logged into the web portal
Employee is on the daily schedule view page
Current day schedule is displayed
Employee has schedules for previous and next days in the database
Navigation buttons (Previous Day/Next Day) are visible on the interface

steps.action: Note the current date displayed in the schedule header
steps.expectedResult: Current date is clearly visible (e.g., 'Monday, January 15, 2024')

steps.action: Click on the 'Previous Day' or left arrow navigation button
steps.expectedResult: Page transitions smoothly and schedule for the previous day is displayed

steps.action: Verify the date header has changed to the previous day
steps.expectedResult: Date header shows the previous day's date (e.g., 'Sunday, January 14, 2024')

steps.action: Verify shift details displayed for the previous day
steps.expectedResult: All shift times, locations, and roles for the previous day are displayed accurately

steps.action: Cross-check displayed data with database records for the previous day
steps.expectedResult: Schedule data matches database records for the previous day without any discrepancies

steps.action: Measure the response time for the previous day navigation
steps.expectedResult: Navigation and data load completes within 2 seconds without delays

steps.action: Click on the 'Next Day' or right arrow navigation button
steps.expectedResult: Page transitions smoothly and schedule for the next day (original current day) is displayed

steps.action: Verify the date header has changed to the next day
steps.expectedResult: Date header shows the next day's date, returning to the original current day

steps.action: Click 'Next Day' button again to move forward one more day
steps.expectedResult: Schedule for the day after current day is displayed with updated date header

steps.action: Verify shift details for the next day are accurate
steps.expectedResult: All shift information is displayed correctly and matches database records

steps.action: Check UI responsiveness by rapidly clicking Previous and Next buttons alternately
steps.expectedResult: UI updates smoothly without freezing, lag, or display errors; each click registers correctly

steps.action: Verify no JavaScript errors appear in browser console during navigation
steps.expectedResult: Browser console shows no errors; all API calls return successful responses

postconditions: Employee remains on the daily schedule view
Navigation buttons remain functional
No data corruption or display errors occur
System maintains session state
Browser history reflects navigation actions

testCases.title: Ensure unauthorized users cannot access schedules
preconditions: Web portal is accessible
Test employee account with valid credentials exists
Another employee account exists in the system for cross-access testing
OAuth2 authentication and RBAC are properly configured
Direct URL to schedule page is known for testing

steps.action: Open a new browser window in incognito/private mode
steps.expectedResult: New browser window opens with no cached credentials or session data

steps.action: Directly enter the schedule URL in the address bar (e.g., https://portal.company.com/schedules/daily) without logging in
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied and user is automatically redirected to the login page

steps.action: Verify an appropriate message is displayed indicating authentication is required
steps.expectedResult: Message such as 'Please log in to access this page' or 'Authentication required' is displayed

steps.action: Check the browser URL after redirect
steps.expectedResult: URL shows the login page path (e.g., https://portal.company.com/login)

steps.action: Enter valid employee credentials (username and password) and click Login
steps.expectedResult: Login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard or schedule page

steps.action: Navigate to the daily schedule view
steps.expectedResult: Employee's own daily schedule is displayed with correct shift information

steps.action: Verify that only the logged-in employee's schedule is visible
steps.expectedResult: Schedule displays only shifts assigned to the logged-in employee; no other employee data is visible

steps.action: Note the employee ID from the current session (visible in profile or URL parameter)
steps.expectedResult: Current employee ID is identified (e.g., employeeId=12345)

steps.action: Manually modify the URL to attempt accessing another employee's schedule by changing the employeeId parameter (e.g., change employeeId=12345 to employeeId=67890)
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied immediately

steps.action: Verify an appropriate error message is displayed
steps.expectedResult: Error message such as 'Access Denied: You do not have permission to view this schedule' or 'Unauthorized access attempt' is displayed

steps.action: Verify the HTTP response code for the unauthorized access attempt
steps.expectedResult: HTTP 403 (Forbidden) or 401 (Unauthorized) status code is returned

steps.action: Check that the user remains on their own schedule or is redirected to an error page
steps.expectedResult: User is either kept on their own schedule page or shown a proper error page; no other employee's data is exposed

steps.action: Verify the security event is logged in the system audit log
steps.expectedResult: Unauthorized access attempt is recorded in audit logs with timestamp, employee ID, and attempted action

postconditions: Unauthorized access attempts are blocked successfully
Security logs contain records of access attempts
Employee's own schedule access remains functional
No data breach or unauthorized data exposure occurs
System security integrity is maintained
